CustomField.description: Check this box if you want this data mapping to run by default for all agreements sent. You can override the default if you specify a different data mapping to use with a specific agreement or agreement template.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box if you want this data mapping to run by default for all agreements sent. You can override the default if you specify a different data mapping to use with a specific agreement or agreement template.
CustomField.label: Default Data Mapping?
